issue.title: build: `make deploy` fails on macOS Big Sur 11.1
issue.body:
```
% make deploy
Making all in src
Making all in doc/man
make[1]: Nothing to be done for `all'.
make[1]: Nothing to be done for `all-am'.
build-aux/install-sh -c -d Bitcoin-Qt.app/Contents/MacOS
STRIPPROG="/usr/bin/strip" /bin/sh /Users/hebasto1/bitcoin/build-aux/install-sh -c -s  ./src/qt/bitcoin-qt Bitcoin-Qt.app/Contents/MacOS/Bitcoin-Qt
/usr/local/bin/python3.9 ./contrib/macdeploy/macdeployqtplus Bitcoin-Qt.app Bitcoin-Core -translations-dir= -dmg
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/hebasto1/bitcoin/./contrib/macdeploy/macdeployqtplus", line 22, in <module>
    from ds_store import DSStore
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'ds_store'
make: *** [Bitcoin-Core.dmg] Error 1
```

events.body: It is easy fixed by `pip3 install ds_store`. The question is: is this a documentation flaw or a bug in the `Makefile.am`?
AFAIK there are more issue like the svg conversion tool... I went down that rabbit hole but couldn't find an exit. A fix would be great.

@jonasschnelli 
>  A fix would be great.

There are to ways:
1) update our docs with `pip3 install ds_store` step, or
2) or add `OSX_DEPLOY_SCRIPT` target to `Makefile.am`

> is this a documentation flaw or a bug in the `Makefile.am`?

issue.title: Add macOS ARM build (universal or additional binaries)
issue.body:
First ARM based Macs are available now.
See the porting guide https://developer.apple.com/documentation/xcode/porting_your_macos_apps_to_apple_silicon and the architectural differences: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/apple_silicon/addressing_architectural_differences_in_your_macos_code

Things to do:
* [x] fix depends build on ARM with macOS 10.16 (done in merged #20482)
* [x] fix CRC32 build issue (fix in #20603)
* [x] update macOS build readme (if required)
* [x] allow cross compiling ARM64 Mac on linux/gitian
* [x] fix `make deploy` on ARM64

issue.title: doc: Add explicit macdeployqtplus dependencies install step
issue.body:
This PR adds to macOS docs an explicit step to install `macdeployqtplus` script dependencies that are not part of the [Python Standard Library](https://docs.python.org/3/library/index.html):
- https://pypi.org/project/ds-store/
- https://pypi.org/project/mac-alias/

This change is required on macOS 11 Big Sur:

-  #20371
- #20878

Close #20878.
